channel.title: Think everything on the news is real?
channel.description:
Think again.
http://www.zeitgeistmovie.com/
Basically, this movie a detailed breakdown of the following:
Part I: Religion, how everything is plagiarized and rubbish, etc. Part II: 9/11 was staged by the Government, and other stuff Part III: What are you being told? Bank scams, ever occurring debts, Wars to reap profits, and the North American Union
What that is you may ask? It's a document that Bush signed erasing the borders of U.S.A., Mexico, and Canada. Soon enough this will be done in Europe, Asia, and Africa, afterworld, it'll form a one world nation.
The important stuff, and in my opinion the best part, is Part III.
Part III is located at: 1:11:04
Courtesy of io9...

item.source: Think everything on the news is real?

item.title: Think everything on the news is real?
item.dc:creator: @Mr.Chris Mr.Chris
item.description:
@Mr.Chris wrote:

[quote=“PaulT, post:11, topic:119615”]If you don’t trust the news you’re better off reading disinformation.com or watching gnn.tv.

And on the question of 9/11 the government is hiding things from the public. People who don’t understand that governments routinely lie to their people and the US is no exception need to educate themselves. From the Gulf of Tonkin Resolution to the JFK assasination to the lies in the 9/11 Commission Report, every government is different, every government is the same.[/quote]

Ok, I agree with you to an extent. Yes, the US government is hiding things about the 9/11 attack. However, I firmly believe that the Government did not plot/plan, or were otherwise involved, with the attack.

Read full topic
item.source: Think everything on the news is real?

item.description:
@kmb wrote:

[quote=“MastrChief, post:9, topic:119615”][quote author=Mr.Chris link=topic=169030.msg1569028#msg1569028 date=1183584063]
I’m going to watch Part I and Part III. 9/11 was not staged by the government, lol. The American government are pretty corrupt…but they aren’t that corrupt…

[/quote]

Anyone who thinks our government did it is stupid, obviously doesn’t believe in this country, and needs to get out imo.[/quote]
It’s not a matter of faith, man.

item.title: Think everything on the news is real?
item.dc:creator: @gothic_queen casey.
item.description:
@gothic_queen wrote:

Ok…done, I got confused on the third part, I liked it, it was really interesting
It brought out a lot to me, some-things I knew were true, and other crap I just thought was bs.
The comparisons of how people were born on December 25, to a virgin mother…
The facts about 9/11 opened somethings up, like tower 7, and how they said the wtc was designed to be able to take multiple crashes…
The end got a bit confusing to me, about Vietnam and so, but I liked it.

Read full topic
